title: Bedros Keuilian - Started from the Bottom
description: This week Ed has legendary immigrant business owner and empire builder Bedros Keuilian on the show. Bedros is the CEO and founder of Fit Body Boot Camp as well as a a best-selling author, speaker and business consultant. His family migrated to America when he was six years old with less than $200 to their name. Bedros shares how he learned to be extremely resourceful and resilient through the adversities that his family faced. This episode takes you through a real life RAGS TO RICHES story that sheds light on the mental strength it takes to turn your hardships into catalysts of growth.
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
